name: Luxury Tower Room
description: Upgraded tower rooms with enhanced luxury appointments, premium furnishings, and panoramic Sierra Nevada views. Features custom Sealy pillow-top mattresses, 55-inch flat screen HDTV, premium Wi-Fi, marble-accented bathroom with June Jacobs products, and Bose Wave Radio. Non-smoking rooms available in king or two queen configurations.
shortDescription: Enhanced luxury tower room with premium furnishings and panoramic mountain views.
